gold-mafia.author: Mutemaringa
gold-mafia.title: The Gold Mafia Scandal
gold-mafia.content: From new-age pastors to old-school smugglers, and from diplomats to the Zimbabwean president's niece, Al Jazeera's latest investigation, Gold Mafia, has uncovered a band of criminals driving gold smuggling and money laundering worth billions of dollars in Southern Africa.
